channel.title: Dissappearing corpses
channel.description:
I have a constant glitch/bug which lets every person/creature I kill somehow "fall" through the floor and dissappear.
I find this extremly annoying since I wan´t to study all the new character models :/
Does anybody experience the same glitch or knows how to get rid of it?
Reinstalling Black Mesa didn´t work so far

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: Gorin
item.description:
I recently reinstalled Black Mesa and ran into the same error.
Right at the beginning after the resonance cascade I burned some zombies with the magnesium torches.
They fall through the floor.

I tried tzp666’s solution and it worked once but a bit annoying.
The burning zombies didn’t fall through the ground they explode in pieces instead.
But after I closed and opened the game again they fell through the floor like before

So I just set all changed TXT and INF files back to default.

After that I opened the registry by type regedit into the command prompt of windows.
I looked for
HKEY_CURRENT_USER -> Software -> Valve
and deleted the whole folder. After that I had to set the graphic settings in Black Mesa again but all other changes are still as I set them at start (keyboard, etc.)

Now the burning zombies don’t fall through the floor but also don’t explode into pieces.
They just fall as a dead briquette on the floor like they normally do in Half-Life 2.

I don’t know if the exploding corpse feature is a Black Mesa addition but I’m fine with the way dead bodies behave now.

So probably deleting the whole Valve folder in the registry will solve the problem.

ATTENTION!
I use an uncut german version of orange box Half-Life 2.
So if someone has a naturally cut version this won’t work.
But if someone has an uncut version and the same issue this probably work without creating a new account and messing around with text files.

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: mgr.inz.player
item.description:
Confirmed, changing inside steam.inf file default appID=218 to appID=109 enables gibbing creatures into bits (if enabled in Black Mesa options tab) and rag-doll. I didn’t touch gameinfo.txt.

For me, missing ragdoll and gib, probably is caused by Left4Dead - Low Violence, I purchased the game on the online auction website.

Read full topic

item.description:
i hope its fixed after greenlight release
for now it works with appid 109

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: MarsUp
item.description:
In presenting all original files BMS (gameinfo.txt and steam.inf included), I tried the command “g_ragdoll_maxcount” and writing in the console eg “g_ragdoll_maxcount 50” (without the quotes) it worked.
It is sufficient, I think, add this command in the “autoexec.cfg” BMS.
The ID without changing anything, it worked.

Can you tell me if it works for you too.

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: tzp666
item.description:
Ok, here is the solution to this problem, which should work for everyone (I hope).

  1. Have all files in their original state.
  2. Start Steam (Steam displays Black Mesa)
  3. Alter the following files in the BMS source directory (sourcemods/…)
    a) steam.inf
    b) gameinfo.txt

so that they look like this:

a)
appID=109

b) “GameInfo”
{
game “Black Mesa”
title “BL@CK MESA”
title2 “”

developer	"Black Mesa Team"
developer_url	"https://www.blackmesasource.com/"
type		"singleplayer_only"

icon            "resource/bms"
nomodels	0
nocrosshair	1

hidden_maps
{
	"test_speakers"	1
	"test_hardware" 1
}

FileSystem
{
	SteamAppId 109
	ToolsAppId 211

	SearchPaths
	{
		Game |gameinfo_path|.
		Game hl2
		Game ep1
		Game ep2
		Game episodic
	}
}

}

Basically you just replace the SteamAppId number with 109.

  1. THIS IS THE IMPORTANT PART: DO NOT CLOSE/RESTART STEAM. Just open the game from the Steam client afterwards. Bodies will stay.
    If you restart Steam, the game will be gone and unlaunchable until you change the numbers back to the way they used to be.

  2. When you want to resume your game, BlackMesa will be gone from Steam. But don’t worry, just reset the numbers (causing the Game to appear once Steam is restarted), and then change them back to “109”.

Should work, let me know if this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: ChickenSoup
item.description:
Works with another steam acccount. Just create -> ok -> ok -> ok, no reinstall necessary. You can Play black Mesa right away and all savegames work. I have NO IDEA why this works.

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: paddysius
item.description:
lochbrett:

to fix it you have to go to your BMS-directory, it´s under sourcemods
and change in the files (gameinfo.txt and steam.inf) the number in the line
“steamappID” and “appID” to “109” . save the files. thats it .

worked !! thanks

OK, I found how to fix the problem as this or change the ID 109 does not work.
In gameinfo.txt I add “AdditionalContentId 420” (420 corespond has ID HL2).

Did not do the trick, either. Sorry

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: MarsUp
item.description:
OK, I found how to fix the problem as this or change the ID 109 does not work.
In gameinfo.txt I add “AdditionalContentId 420” (420 corespond has ID HL2).

Which gives:

[code]“GameInfo”
{
game “Black Mesa”
title “BL@CK MESA”
title2 “”

developer	"Black Mesa Team"
developer_url	"https://www.blackmesasource.com/"
type		"singleplayer_only"

icon            "resource/bms"
nomodels	0
nocrosshair	1

hidden_maps
{
	"test_speakers"	1
	"test_hardware" 1
}

FileSystem
{
	SteamAppId 218
	AdditionalContentId 420
	ToolsAppId 211

	SearchPaths
	{
		Game |gameinfo_path|.
		Game hl2
		Game ep1
		Game ep2
		Game episodic
	}
}

}[/code]

I say thank you “lochbrett” You gave me the idea to do this.
Now I can fully apreciate this wonderful Mod.
Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: lochbrett
item.description:
So here´s now the permanent fix:
you have to go to your BMS-directory, it´s under sourcemods
and change the file (steam.inf) the number in the line
“appID” from 210 to 109. save the file. thats it .

Now it´s permanent working

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: MarsUp
item.description:
King_Kaddo:

FOUND A FIX!

This is veery strange. I created a temporary Steam account and started Black Mesa up. It’s the same installation of both Black Mesa and The sdk yet no more falling through AND no more fading away when npcs die in scripted sequences. When I switch back to my original account, which has several censored games from Valve(but not installed) the problem occurs again but my other account works perfectly fine. I can reproduce this on my laptop, same result.

:facepalm:
Then I do not understand and I will not create a new Steam account just for this game I rapel I am neither Australia nor ALEMAGNE I’m in France and games have no censorship.

There must be something else, a conflict with the Source Thurs install, but I’m not going to uninstall all my games for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: davbig
item.description:
King_Kaddo:

FOUND A FIX!

This is veery strange. I created a temporary Steam account and started Black Mesa up. It’s the same installation of both Black Mesa and The sdk yet no more falling through AND no more fading away when npcs die in scripted sequences. When I switch back to my original account, which has several censored games from Valve(but not installed) the problem occurs again but my other account works perfectly fine. I can reproduce this on my laptop, same result.

[COLOR=‘Black’]Srsly, fuck germany and their bullshit censoring of Valve games, because they made CounterStrike. There is not a single fucking uncensored game from Valve. They ruined BM for me.

works! THANK YOU!

greetings from germany!

item.title: Dissappearing corpses
item.dc:creator: MarsUp
item.description:
Raminator:

The fact that it only seems to be affecting Australians and Germans is suspicious. What other Steam games do you guys own, and which ones do you have installed? We might be able to figure out which one is causing this.

For my part as a games, MOD and tools I have :

Games :
Counter-Stricke: Source
Day of Defeat: Source
Half-Life
Half-Life: Source
Half-Life 2
Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
Half-Life 2: Episode One
Half-Life 2: Episode Tow
Half-Life 2: Lost Cost
Left 4 Dead
Portal
Portal 2

MOD :
Cry of Fear (HL1 Mod)
Korsakovia (HL2 Mod)
Nightmare House 2 (HL2 Mod)
FakeFactory Cinematic (HL2 Mod)

Tools :
Source SDK
Source SDK Base 2006
Source SDK Base 2007
